Font Size

class name in rems in pixels
.f2- 0.75rem 12px
.f1- 0.875rem 14px
.f0 1rem 16px
.f1 1.125rem 18px
.f2 1.25rem 20px
.f3 1.5rem 24px
.f4 1.75rem 28px
.f5 2rem 32px
.f6 2.5rem 40px
.f7 3rem 48px
.f8 4rem 64px

Default Class

<body class="f0">
 
  text is normal
 
  <h1 class="f8"> text is huge <h1>
  <small class="f2-"> text is tiny </small>
 
</body>

Customising

To change the prefix from f to something else, you may use the $font-size-prop variable to override. Also the $font-sizes variable can be overridden with a map to change the scale.

// $font-sizes inherits from the $text-scale set
// in the defaults file.
$font-size-prop:        "f" !default;
$font-sizes:            $text-scale !default;

/src/components/text/_size.scss
